message: When Chuck Norris pours milk on his Rice Krispies, they shut the fuck up!
When Chuck Norris' remote control batteries die, the remote continues to function out of pure terror.
@irock lol his Poker face scared them.
Chuck Norris’ calendar goes straight from March 31st to April 2nd - No one fools with Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can divide by zero.
Contrary to popular belief, America is not a democracy, it is a Chucktatorship.
There is no theory of evolution. Just a list of animals Chuck Norris allows to live.
Chuck Norris once ran a marathon backwards...just to see what second place looks like.
Chuck Norris wears bear traps on his feet instead of sandals.
Chuck Norris won the 1983 World Series of Poker despite holding only a Joker, a Get out of jail free Monopoly card, a 2 of clubs, 7 of spades and a green No.4 Uno card.
Chuck Norris once won a game of Connect 4 in 3 moves.
Chuck Norris has to use a stunt double when he does crying scenes.
Chuck Norris was banned from Search & Destroy on Modern Warfare 2 because he kept getting nukes in the first round and ending the games too quickly
Chuck Norris can cook minute rice in 30 seconds.
If Chuck Norris misses a roundhouse-kick, you will still die.
Chuck Norris can drown a fish
